author: S. Prasad
title: Cuddalore police launch ‘Stay Home Stay Safe’ campaign
description: The video has already gone viral on a social networking site and has over 16 lakhs views and has been shared 38,000 times so far
content: Stay Home, Stay Safe is the new mantra in a video released by the Cuddalore district police. Finding that the cooperation from the people to the repeated calls made by the police to stay at home to contain the spread of COVID-19 is not forthcoming in full sca… [+2189 chars]
